for _ in range(int(input())):
    (N, P, Q) = list(map(int, input().split()))
    A = list(map(int, input().split()))
    A.sort()
    z = 0
    for i in A:
        x = min(Q, i // 2)
        y = min(P, i - 2 * x)
        if y + 2 * x >= i:
            P -= y
            Q -= x
            z += 1
    print(z)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    (n, p, q) = map(int, input().split())
    arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
    arr.sort()
    ans = 0
    for i in arr:
        res = i // 2
        if q >= res:
            if not i & 1:
                ans += 1
                q -= res
            elif p >= i - 2 * res:
                q -= res
                p -= i - 2 * res
                ans += 1
        elif p >= i - 2 * q:
            ans += 1
            p -= i - 2 * q
            q = 0
    print(ans)

t = int(input())
while t > 0:
    ans = 0
    (n, p, q) = map(int, input().split())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    a.sort()
    for i in a:
        if p + 2 * q < i:
            break
        k = i // 2
        if i & 1:
            rem = 1
        else:
            rem = 0
        if rem > p:
            continue
        p -= rem
        q -= k
        ans += 1
    print(ans)
    t -= 1

t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    (n, p, q) = map(int, input().split())
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    l.sort()
    c = 0
    for i in l:
        if p + 2 * q < i:
            break
        cost = min(q, i // 2)
        if p >= i - 2 * cost:
            c += 1
            q -= cost
            p -= i - 2 * cost
    print(c)

from heapq import heapify, heappop
for i in range(int(input())):
    (n, p, q) = map(int, input().split())
    heap = list(map(int, input().split()))
    heapify(heap)
    ans = 0
    while heap:
        temp = heappop(heap)
        if temp // 2 <= q:
            qLoss = temp // 2
            temp = temp & 1
        else:
            temp -= 2 * q
            qLoss = q
        if temp <= p:
            pLoss = temp
            temp = 0
        else:
            temp -= p
            pLoss = p
        if temp > 0:
            continue
        ans += 1
        p -= pLoss
        q -= qLoss
    print(ans)

    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    a.sort()
    c = 0
    for j in a:
        if j // 2 <= q and j % 2 <= p:
            q -= j // 2
            p -= j % 2
            c += 1
        elif j // 2 > q and p >= j - 2 * q:
            p -= j - 2 * q
            q = 0
            c += 1
    print(c)

from sys import stdin, stdout
input = stdin.readline
t = int(input().strip())
for _ in range(t):
    (n, p, q) = list(map(int, input().strip().split()))
    arr = list(map(int, input().strip().split()))
    arr.sort()
    count = 0
    prev = q
    for num in arr:
        t1 = num // 2
        prev = q
        if t1 >= q:
            t2 = num - 2 * q
            q = 0
        else:
            q -= t1
            t2 = num % 2
        if p >= t2:
            p -= t2
        else:
            q = prev
            continue
        count += 1
    print(count)

def curr_m(P, Q):
    return P + Q * 2
for _ in range(int(input())):
    (N, P, Q) = map(int, input().split())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    a.sort()
    count = 0
    for i in range(N):
        (p, q, r) = (P, Q, a[i])
        if curr_m(P, Q) >= a[i]:
            if a[i] % 2 == 0:
                req_2 = int(r / 2)
                r -= min(q, req_2) * 2
                q -= min(q, req_2)
                if r != 0:
                    req_1 = r
                    r -= min(p, req_1)
                    p -= min(p, req_1)
                if r == 0:
                    count += 1
                    (P, Q) = (p, q)
            else:
                req_2 = int(r / 2)
                r -= min(q, req_2) * 2
                q -= min(q, req_2)
                req_1 = r
                r -= min(p, req_1)
                p -= min(p, req_1)
                if r == 0:
                    count += 1
                    (P, Q) = (p, q)
    print(count)

def curr_m(P, Q):
    return P + Q * 2
for _ in range(int(input())):
    (N, P, Q) = map(int, input().split())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    a.sort()
    count = 0
    for i in range(N):
        (p, q, r) = (P, Q, a[i])
        if curr_m(P, Q) >= a[i]:
            if a[i] % 2 == 0:
                req_2 = int(r / 2)
                r -= min(q, req_2) * 2
                q -= min(q, req_2)
                if r != 0:
                    req_1 = r
                    r -= min(p, req_1)
                    p -= min(p, req_1)
                if r == 0:
                    count += 1
                    (P, Q) = (p, q)
            else:
                req_2 = int(r / 2)
                r -= min(q, req_2) * 2
                q -= min(q, req_2)
                req_1 = r
                r -= min(p, req_1)
                p -= min(p, req_1)
                if r == 0:
                    count += 1
                    (P, Q) = (p, q)
    print(count)

for i in range(int(input())):
    (n, o, t) = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    a = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    a.sort()
    ans = 0
    for i in a:
        two_coin = 0
        one_coin = 0
        if 2 * t + o < i:
            break
        if i // 2 > 0:
            two_coin = i // 2
        if two_coin > t:
            two_coin = t
        one_coin = i - 2 * two_coin
        if one_coin > o:
            continue
        t = t - two_coin
        o = o - one_coin
        ans += 1
    print(ans)

        if r > q:
            r = q

            q -= r
            p -= k - r * 2

            pass
    print(count)

T = int(input())
for i in range(T):
    m = input().split(' ')
    N = int(m[0])
    P = int(m[1])
    Q = int(m[2])
    a = input().split(' ')
    l = []
    for i in range(N):
        l.append(int(a[i]))
    l.sort()
    count = 0
    for i in range(len(l)):
        c = int(l[i] / 2)
        d = int(l[i] % 2)
        if d <= P and c <= Q:
            P = P - d
            Q = Q - c
            count = count + 1
        elif c > Q:
            c = c - Q
            Q = 0
            if c * 2 + d <= P:
                P = P - (c * 2 + d)
                count = count + 1
            else:
                break
    print(count)

for tcase in range(int(input())):
    (n, p, q) = map(int, input().split())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    a.sort()
    i = 0
    while i < n and q > 0 and (p > 0):
        d = min(q, a[i] // 2)
        a[i] -= 2 * d
        q -= d
        if a[i] == 1:
            a[i] = 0
            p -= 1
        i += 1
    i0 = max(i - 1, 0)
    i = i0

            d = min(q, a[i] // 2)
            a[i] -= 2 * d
            q -= d
        i += 1
    i = i0

            a[i] -= 2 * d
            q -= d
        i += 1
    a.sort()

    while i < n and p > 0:
        d = min(p, a[i])
        a[i] -= d
        p -= d
        i += 1
    i = i0
    while i < n and a[i] == 0:
        i += 1
    print(i)

for i in range(t):

for _ in range(int(input())):
    (n, p, q) = map(int, input().split())
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    l.sort()
    ans = 0
    for i in range(n):
        x = min(q, l[i] // 2)
        l[i] -= x * 2
        if l[i] <= p:
            p -= l[i]
            q -= x
            ans += 1
    print(ans)

def main():
    T = int(input())
    for t in range(T):
        (N, ones, twos) = map(int, input().split(' '))
        debts = sorted(map(int, input().split(' ')))
        satisfied = 0
        for debt in debts:
            req_twos = min(debt // 2, twos)
            debt -= 2 * req_twos
            req_ones = min(debt, ones)
            debt -= req_ones
            if debt:
                continue
            satisfied += 1
            ones -= req_ones
            twos -= req_twos
            if not ones and (not twos):
                break
        print(satisfied)
main()

t = int(input())
while t:
    t -= 1
    (n, p, q) = map(int, input().split())
    arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
    arr.sort()
    ans = 0
    for i in range(n):
        x = arr[i] // 2
        q_given = min(q, x)
        p_given = min(p, arr[i] - q_given * 2)
        if p_given + q_given * 2 == arr[i]:
            ans += 1
            p -= p_given
            q -= q_given
        if p == 0 and q == 0:
            break
    print(ans)

def test(p, q, fares):
    fares.sort()
    counter = 0
    for f in fares:
        if f - p - 2 * q > 0:
            break
        elif f % 2 == 1 and p == 0:
            continue
        else:
            copy = f
            if copy % 2 == 1:
                p -= 1
                copy -= 1
            nb2 = min(copy / 2, q)
            copy -= 2 * nb2
            q -= nb2
            nb1 = min(copy, p)
            copy -= nb1
            p -= nb1
            counter += 1
    return counter

def main():
    nb_tests = int(input())
    for ti in range(nb_tests):
        (n, p, q) = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
        fares = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
        counter = test(p, q, fares)
        print(counter)
main()

import math
a = int(input())
for i in range(a):
    aa = list(map(int, input().split()))
    bb = list(map(int, input().split()))
    bb.sort()
    num1 = aa[1]
    num2 = aa[2]
    count = 0
    for i in range(aa[0]):
        kk = bb[i]
        cc = int(bb[i] / 2)
        if cc <= num2:
            kk -= cc * 2
            if num1 >= kk:
                count += 1
                num1 -= kk
                num2 -= cc
        else:
            kk -= num2 * 2
            num2 = 0
            if num1 >= kk:
                count += 1
                num1 -= kk
    print(count)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    (n, p, q) = list(map(int, input().split()))
    arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
    arr.sort()
    i = ans = 0
    while i < n and (p > 0 or q > 0):
        twoavail = min(arr[i] // 2, q)
        arr[i] -= 2 * twoavail
        q -= twoavail
        oneavail = min(arr[i], p)
        arr[i] -= oneavail
        p -= oneavail
        if arr[i] == 0:
            ans += 1
        else:
            q += twoavail
            p += oneavail
        i += 1
    print(ans)

for t in range(int(input())):
    temp = list(map(int, input().split()))
    n = temp[0]
    p = temp[1]
    q = temp[2]
    amount = p + 2 * q
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))
    a.sort()
    ans = 0
    for i in range(n):
        if amount <= 0 or amount < a[i]:
            break
        two = a[i] // 2
        one = a[i] % 2
        rev = 0
        if q >= two:
            q -= two
            rev = two
            amount -= 2 * two
            a[i] -= 2 * two
        else:
            amount -= 2 * q
            rev = q
            a[i] -= 2 * q
            q = 0
        if a[i] != 0 and p == 0:
            q += rev
            amount += 2 * rev
            continue
        else:
            p -= a[i]
            amount -= a[i]
            ans += 1
    print(ans)

t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
    (n, p, q) = input().split()
    (n, p, q) = (int(n), int(p), int(q))
    l = list(map(int, input().split()))
    l.sort()
    c = 0
    for j in range(len(l)):
        if l[j] % 2 != 0:
            if p <= 0:
                continue
        m = min(q, l[j] // 2)
        l[j] -= 2 * m
        q -= m
        m = min(p, l[j])
        l[j] -= m
        p -= m
        if l[j] > 0:
            break
        else:
            c += 1
    print(c)

t = int(input())
while t > 0:
    t -= 1
    (n, p, q) = map(int, input().strip().split())
    li = list(map(int, input().strip().split()))
    li.sort()
    i = 0
    amt = 2 * q + p
    count = 0
    while i < n and amt >= li[i]:
        j = min(q, li[i] // 2)
        k = min(p, li[i] - j * 2)
        x = k + j * 2
        if x == li[i]:
            q -= j
            p -= k
            count += 1
        amt = 2 * q + p
        i += 1
    print(count)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    (n, p, q) = map(int, input().split())
    arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
    arr.sort()
    ite = 0
    tot = 0
    while ite < n:
        if arr[ite] > p + 2 * q:
            break
        if p == 0:
            if arr[ite] & 1:
                ite += 1
            else:
                q -= arr[ite] // 2
                tot += 1
                ite += 1
        elif q == 0:
            p -= arr[ite]
            tot += 1
            ite += 1
        else:
            (two, one) = divmod(arr[ite], 2)
            if arr[ite] & 1:
                if two <= q:
                    q -= arr[ite] // 2
                    p -= 1
                    tot += 1
                    ite += 1
                else:
                    rem = 2 * (two - q)
                    q = 0
                    p -= rem
                    p -= 1
                    tot += 1
                    ite += 1
            elif two <= q:
                q -= arr[ite] // 2
                tot += 1
                ite += 1
            else:
                rem = 2 * (two - q)
                q = 0
                p -= rem
                tot += 1
                ite += 1
    print(tot)

T = int(input())
for _t in range(T):
    (N, P, Q) = map(int, input().strip().split())
    A = list(map(int, input().strip().split()))
    A.sort()
    a = P + (Q << 1)
    i = 0
    ans = 0
    while a > 0 and i < N:
        j = A[i]
        t = min(Q, j >> 1)
        o = min(P, j - (t << 1))
        x = o + (t << 1)
        if x == j and x <= a:
            ans += 1
            a -= x
            P -= o
            Q -= t
        i += 1
    print(ans)

for i in range(int(input())):
    (n, p, q) = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
    a = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
    count = 0
    for i in sorted(a):
        no_2 = i // 2
        q1 = q
        if no_2 <= q:
            q1 -= no_2
        else:
            q1 = 0
            no_2 = q
        if p >= i - 2 * no_2:
            p -= i - 2 * no_2
            q = q1
            count += 1
    print(count)

T = int(input())
for _ in range(T):
    (n, p, q) = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    arr = [int(x) for x in input().split()]
    count = 0
    arr.sort()
    for i in arr:
        t = i
        u = min(q, t // 2)
        t -= 2 * u
        if p >= t:
            count += 1
            q -= u
            p -= i - 2 * u
    print(count)
